definition: لأك IV to send as a messenger (الى ه s.o. to) ملأك mal’ak and ملك malak pl. ملائك malā’ik2, ملائكة malā’ika angel; messenger, envoy لوك (لاك) lāka u (lauk) to chew (هـ s.th.); to talk constantly about s.th. (هـ), to bring into discredit (سمعته sum‘atahū s.o.’s reputation) │لاك الكلام (kalām) to be inhibited in one’s speech, stammer, express o.s. imperfectly, السؤال الذي تلوكه الألسنة (alsina) the question which is on everyone’s lips; ما تلوكه الألسن (alsun) what people say, what is generally rumored
